Reviews.Content: booked hotel 2 nights arrival front door tape covering cracks booked double roomwith double bed shocked bunk reception keys triple 3rd floorthis single double bed walk sheets appeared cleanthere numerous stains cups corner badly stained entire bad smell itthe bathtoilet cupboard tiny nasty receptionist stay hear phoned manager hotelwhere offered roomwhich fear refused refund kept telling prices cheapwe managed stop payment via credit card strongly advise thinking staying elsewhere disgusting closed

Reviews.Title: “Do NOT Stay Here!!! Words cannot describe the state of it.”

Reviews.Content: sometimes cheap true below true booked night stay family 4 night earls court garden hotel 3 friends £75 cheap london positive location earls court tube station 2 minutes walking negatives start family pictures beds 2 dirty bunk beds family planning staying dont kids filthy dirty carpet imagine clean maybe booking lead believe own bathroom true communal style 1970s shower head sink warm water tiny shower curtain youre 3rd floor downstairs warm water curtains window instead sainsburys bag hanging window block light website doesnt tell tube line six minutes 6 am woken tube 1 morning tea facilities nope 4 plastic cups water dispensing machine youd probably scald hands poured hot water thats didnt melt hot water lock valuables door family knocked force none exaggerated cheap shop spend extra £10 truely furious stay dirty beyond basic germ ridden hotel

Reviews.Title: “Not as bad as i expected.”

Reviews.Content: read reviews hotel dreading sorts bugs creatures sharing bad bathroom clean hotel major refurbishment yes underground track bother light sleeper didnt wake personally hotel morning hear walking doors slamming people talking bed previous night 11 quiet except trains hotel perfect location 1 minute walk tube station admist array shopsbars resturants highly recommend hotel budget

Reviews.Title: “Stay here only if you're DRAMATICALLY on a budget and everything else in London is booked”

Reviews.Content: stayed earls court gardens night oct 2010 london booked days art fair film festival advantage sort deal double single 730pm welcomed guy enthusiasm £10 key deposit seen instead morning floor tiny window overlooking underground literally couldnt close eyes 5am trains passing single minute dirty wallpapers falling walls strange holes ceiling feel uncomfortable checked cockroaches fortunately didnt brief encounter late night pee floor toilet scared hell nice bathroom floor definitely cleanest building shower running heating unbearable wash pairs socks happened dry minutes hotel couple minutes walk earls court tube stop id location reception guy mistake payment pay £5 day £5 key deposit careful

Reviews.Title: “NEVER AGAIN”

Reviews.Content: booked easytobookcom paid 80 gbp single basic 3 nights excellent location frienly indian gentleman welcomed butthere floor window close building carpet furniture didn´t bother hotel leave shopping bags sleep couldn´t tube running direcly window couldn´t close heating sauna dirty water heater remains tee stinky water afraid insects rats probably powder that´s hotel smell sheets towels clean bathrom tiny shared 4 night lack sleep third floor slightly noise didn´t heat close window window guests throw garbage count cans beers boxes garbage bathroom third floor water shower probably low pressure third floor wc pee stuff inside departure key deposite 5 gbp 2 gbp guy didn´t 5 recommend

Reviews.Content: means resorting saying hostel experience hotel yes convenient location near earls court tube positives dirty smells bad health hazard hotel beside tube sound trains continues impossible nights sleep tv doesnt special provided hotel worth cheap price overall horrible experience dont

Reviews.Title: “Is that poop or mould on the ceiling?”

Reviews.Content: paying £17 night hotel wasnt expecting wasnt expecting wasnt expecting comfy expecting clean staff little quality guests stay apparently start awful experience arrived hotel midnight reception key instead phone hotel arrived phoned told pick keys hotel told directions door earls court gardens hotel arrow told phone proceeded reel list directions annoyed repeat directions gone wrong gotten lost finally hotel settling bill paying key deposit key slight confusion money whats pounds scottish money british money time checked scotland britain honest expected usually run scottish money visiting england considering owed change receptionist £70 note explaining collect £2 change hotel morning 7am change real started hotel found 203 difficulties bit squeeze doors tiny suitcase cry glance looked clean soon looked story damp patches ceiling stain poor lighting unable identify decided mould poo unpleasant discovery started inspecting rest bit thoroughly wallpaper coming walls carpet stained pretty badly underneath bed window curtains curtains window falling cupboard hang dress changed mind soon grotty inside cupboard hadnt late left found else top theres looked onto railway tracks meant didnt sleep roughly 2am trains stopped past woken 6am started poor nights sleep decided worth staying hotel phoned travel lodge booked farringdon hotel costing £100 planning spending clean ready check discovered top else hot water shower taps switch soap washing hands bathroom reception 830am hour half told money found unmanned quick call main hotel receptionist dragged bed serve told able refund night staying money premises 1030am manager ordeal arrived pretty poor especially youre supposed able check 11am £10 key deposit intend scam extra £10 tourists stay handed key filled form saying unhappy stay refused sign money breakfast nearby sainsburys 1030am returned receptionist told times patient wait walking door coming money couple check time served leave rest money returned form filled reminded wasnt signing money sign write complaint money trust complaint otherwise looks bad lose job arguing minutes fair complaints customer services finally wrote complaint form money except £2 change caused argument principle left realised theyd scottish notes laugh throughout ordeal receptionist apologise except monotonous sorry inconvenience walked door half hours lodged complaint checked hours told wed able served able leave piece advice staying hotel dont disgusting staff couldnt care customer satisfaction wouldnt wish hotel worst enemy
